string.text: Wanderer Autonomy
Allow clanless Wanderers to interact with lords and other wanderers
Hero Setup
Minimum Attraction
Attraction score required for NPCs to consider others as attractive
Logging Setup
Relationship Logs
Show relationship changes in the logs
friends with benefits
{HERO1.LINK} and {HERO2.LINK} are now {RELATIONSHIP}
Chance Getting Caught
Chance of getting caught by partners while interacting wth other heroes
You flirted with {HERO.LINK}. (Love {NUM})
You had a casual conversation with {HERO.LINK}. (Trust {NUM})
Show Only Clan Interaction
Show only interactions of your clan members in the chatlog
my lover
my love
my betrothed
my special friend
Excuse me, {TITLE}. We have never met...but I could not help myself asking you for a few minutes of your time.
{TITLE}, it is good to see you! May I humbly request to occupy some of your time?
Of course, {TITLE}. How can I be of service?
My apologies, {TITLE}, but I am short of time right now.
I always like to hear new stories. Tell me about your latest exploits while traveling in the realm.
I would like to hear your opinion of a certain matter which has been occupying my mind for a while.
I have to say...I really like your smile. Would you mind telling me more about yourself?
Would you mind going for a walk with me? I want to cause jealousy with your outstanding appearance.
I must confess, I cannot stop thinking of you. I clearly have feelings for you, {TITLE}, and would like to move our relationship further. What do you say?
Your presence makes me blush, {TITLE}. I would love to see you more frequently, just the two of us in private. What do you say, {TITLE}?
Oh, {TITLE}, I have been missing you! The servants prepared a meal in my private chambers. Would you care to join me?
I was looking forward to see you, {TITLE}. Would you like to retreat somewhere more silent, for a more private conversation?
We are in luck, {TITLE}. {SPOUSE} is currently not around and the chambermaid swore to remain silent. Will you come with me?
Ugh, {SPOUSE} is finally away. Now we have all the rooms for us! The servants will keep to themselves. Care to join me, {TITLE}?
I will be blunt with you, {TITLE}. I have urgent needs which call for satisfaction, and you look like a person who can be descreet. May I ask for your help?
This is very embarassing for me, {TITLE}. I have a certain itch which requires attention, and I was hoping you could... scratch my itch. What do you say?
You are {TITLE} and I trust you. I was wondering if we could help each other in terms of... natural urges on a regular basis. Would you like that?
I was thinking if we could help each other, {TITLE}. In terms of pleasure, to be blunt. We could have our moments and enjoy each other. What do you say?
I was looking forward to see you, {TITLE}. Would you care for a chat and maybe some...exercises in bed afterwards?
Oh, {TITLE}. I was hoping you had some time for a conversation and some...anatomical studies later on. Are you interested?
{SPOUSE} is not around I need to feel you, {TITLE}! Let's head to the bedchamber and enjoy ourselves. Would you like that?
Now that {SPOUSE} is not around, I was thinking that you and I could use the empty bed for ourselves, {TITLE}. Does this tempt you?
Come here and kiss me, {TITLE}! I'm craving for your body and I want to enjoy you with all the lust and pleasure there is to have!
Let's get rid off those clothes of yours. I'll show you a different kind of battle in my bedchamber, where both sides win!
I love you very much, {TITLE}. I think it's time for us to take the next step in our relationship. Will you marry me?
You know, {TITLE}, I have deep feelings for you and I think to know that you are the one. Would you like to marry me?
Now that we are in a settlement, {TITLE}, let's call a priest and finally get married! What do you say, {TITLE}?
We could use the opportunity while we're in a settlement, {TITLE}. Let's head over to the church and seal the bond for life!
Alright. Let's have a conversation then, {TITLE}.
Of course {TITLE}, I would love to join you.
Oh {TITLE}, I wish for the same!
Sure {TITLE}, I enjoy every minute with you.
Oh yes, {TITLE}. Let's enjoy the time as long as they're gone.
Don't worry {TITLE}. I understand how you feel and I will gladly help you.
Interesting proposition, {TITLE}. I think I like the idea.
Of course, {TITLE}. I could use some entertainment.
Oh, the things we do for excitement... Lead the way, {TITLE}!
As you wish. I can guarantee that you will not sleep much, {TITLE}...
You make my dream come true, {TITLE}. Yes, I would love to marry you!
We're at a settlement, {TITLE}. Let's marry right now!
I agree, {TITLE}. Let's seal that bond of ours.
I am sorry {TITLE}, but I have no interest in that right now.
You had a date with {HERO.LINK}. (Love {NUM}, Trust {NUM2})
You saw {HERO.LINK} having a date with {TARGET.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} saw you having a date with {TARGET.LINK}.
You were intimate with {HERO.LINK}...
You caught {HERO.LINK} being intimate with {TARGET.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} caught you being intimate with {TARGET.LINK}.
You got pregnant from {HERO.LINK}.
You impregnated {HERO.LINK}...
{HERO.LINK} was born!
You are engaged to {HERO.LINK}.
You and {HERO.LINK} are now friends.
You and {HERO.LINK} are now friends...with benefits.
You banished {HERO.LINK} from your clan!
{HERO.LINK} has left your clan.
Clan Changes Logs
Show clan changes in the logs
{HERO.LINK} has left {OLDCLAN}.
{HERO.LINK} was thrown out of {OLDCLAN} by {CAUSEDBY.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} joined {CLAN}.
You ended your relationship with {HERO.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} ended their relationship with you.
{HERO.LINK} married {TARGET.LINK}.
{TITLE}, may I occupy a few minutes of your time?
Let's talk about something else, {TITLE}.
Apologies, {TITLE}, but my spouse is around. We should not risk it.
Apologies, {TITLE}, but I will not do that with you.
I am sorry {TITLE}, but I am not ready for this step just yet.
Again? Give me some rest, {TITLE}. Let's talk about it later.
You are now the lover of {HERO.LINK}.
1: Hero Selection
Select Hero
2: Personality
Represents how willing a person is to try new things
Refers to an individual's desire to be careful and diligent
Measures how energetic, outgoing and confident a person is
Refers to how an individual interacts with others
Represents how much someone is inclined to experience negative emotions
3: Desire
Attraction To Men
Defines whether an individual finds male persons attractive or not
Attraction To Women
Defines whether an individual finds female persons attractive or not
Attraction To Weight
Defines whether an individual has interest in chubby or thin heroes
Attraction To Build
Defines whether an individual has interest in muscular or weak heroes
Attraction To Age Difference
Defines whether an individual has interest in older or younger heroes in year difference
Defines whether an individual generally develops interest in intercourse or not
Represents how willing a hero currently is for intercourse due to hormons
4: Relation to Player
Trust value to the player
Love value to the player
Tension value to the player
No Relationship
No relationship with the player
Has friendship with the player
Friend with benefits
Has friendship with benefits with the player
Is a couple with the player
Is engaged with the player
Is married the player
Sexual orientation
Children Logs
Show birth, conceptions or orphanage events in the logs
{HERO1.LINK} was impregnated by {HERO2.LINK}!
{CHILD.LINK} was born to {HERO1.LINK} and {HERO2.LINK}.
Greetings, {TITLE},you don't know me yet. I am {HERO} of the {CLAN}.
Good day, {TITLE}. It's good that I caught you.
It looks like you and {HERO} were...enjoying yourselves. Are you aware that they are {STATUS}?
Huh...so you and {HERO} were enjoying each other's company...in bed. You did know that they are {STATUS}, right?
So you have given birth to {CHILD}. The child is apparently from {FATHER} and not from me. You are {STATUS}, right?
You married {HERO} behind my back. Did you even think about telling me? You are {STATUS}!
So you and {HERO} are now engaged, is that right? Did you think that I won't hear about it?!
my spouse
my friend
my acquaintance
Apparently you and {HERO.LINK} often have private meetings. Have you forgotten that you are {STATUS}?
So {HERO} was giving you a good time in bed, eh? You are {STATUS}, or have you forgotten?
{HERO} has given birth to {CHILD}, and you are apparently the father. I thought you are {STATUS}?
Relation loss with {HERO}. (Love {NUM}, Trust {NUM2})
I forgive you, {TITLE}. But believe me, I will not forget it.
I will not accept this, {TITLE}. You deserve nothing more from me. I will end this relationship.
This won't be forgotten, {TITLE}. Farewell.
Nevermind, {TITLE}. Farewell.
Oh {TITLE}, I love you! I beg you, don't do anything you might regret later...
Well, oh well, {TITLE}. So what now?
As you wish, {TITLE}.
Pregnancy Duration
How many days is a hero pregnant before giving birth
Pregnancy Chance
Chance a hero gets pregnant (only for Dramalord pregnancies)
Minimum Dating Love
Love points required to consider dating a hero
Select hero from list and press 'Load Hero' (only works with running campaign)
Load Hero
Current Attraction
Current attraction value to player
Current Sympathy
Current sympathy value to player
Bonus Player Attraction
Bonus value for player's attraction to other heroes
Chance Approaching Player
Chance that heroes approach the player for conversations
You ended your friendship with {HERO.LINK}.
{HERO.LINK} ended their friendship with you.
Minimum Marriage Love
Love points required to consider to marry a hero
Days Between Interactions
Number of days heroes can't interact with the same hero again
Is married to the player
Player Default Pregnancies
Allow default pregnancies for the player or their spouse
Player Always Witness
The player will always be witness of events
You saw {HERO.LINK} proposing to {TARGET.LINK}!
{HERO.LINK} saw you proposing to {TARGET.LINK}!
Bonus Player Sympathy
Bonus value for player's sympathy to other heroes
Show Friends With Benefits
Show friends with benefits on Encyclopedia page of a hero
Show Lovers
Show lovers on Encyclopedia page of a hero
Of course, {TITLE}. Let me tell you a tale of war and power...
Oh {TITLE}, you're very silly! All eyes will turn on you anyway, and I will enjoy that.
You know, {TITLE}... I dreamed of this moment since I laid eyes on you!
Of course, {TITLE}. Let us spend some quality time, just the two of us.
Show Betrotheds
Show betrotheds on Encyclopedia page of a hero
It hurts me, {TITLE}, but I have to put an end to our relationship.
Oh no, {TITLE}! You are breaking my heart, but I know I have no other choice then to accept your decision...
Well, eventually it always comes to this, right {TITLE}? It was nice while it lasted, truly. Thank you.
I... I don't know what to say. This is just distressing. I need some time to decide if I should stay around you...
Get out of my sight, {NAME}. Pack your belongings and leave.
I will give you one more chance, {TITLE}, but you have to end it with {HERO}.
I've heard that you married {HERO}. I guess they forgot to tell you that they are actually {STATUS}?
Congratulations to you and {HERO} on your engagement. I just wanted to mention that they are {STATUS}.
Player Clan Autonomy
Allow heroes of your clan to interact with lords and other wanderers
Not today, {TITLE}. I'm not in the mood, ask me some other time.
Allow Incest
Allow AI to approach family members for intimate and emotional events
Player Conversation Cooldown
Number of days heroes can't interact with the player after speaking to them
Allow Same Sex Marriage
Allow AI to marry other heroes of the same sex (otherwise they are just lovers)
Allow Interaction In Army
Allow AI to interact with each other while being in armies
{HERO1.LINK} put child {CHILD.LINK} into an orphanage.
{HERO1.LINK} adopted orphan {CHILD.LINK}.
Good day, {TITLE}. How can I help you?
I would like to extend my family and adopt an orphan.
I want to get rid off a child in my clan.
Oh, that is great {TITLE}! We have currently {BOYS} boys and {GIRLS} girls in our orphanage.
I am truly sorry {TITLE}, but you have to be married in order to adopt a child. Such is the law of our land to ensure that these children will be taken care of.
My apologies {TITLE}, but there are currently no children in our orphanage.
I would like to adopt a boy.
I would like to adopt a girl.
Who would you like to adopt?
{ORPHAN.NAME}, {ORPHANAGE} years old.
I am thinking of a different child.
Very well. Are you absolutely sure you want to adopt {ORPHAN.NAME}?
Congratulations! I'm sure {ORPHAN.NAME} will be in good hands.
Oh well, that's sad. {ORPHAN.NAME} will be very disappointed.
Of course {TITLE}, we can arrange that.
{TITLE}, it appears that there are no children in your clan.
Who would be the unfortunate child that we should take into custody?
Very well. Are you absolutely sure you want to give away {ORPHAN.NAME}?
Then it is decided. We will take care of {ORPHAN.NAME} and find a new home for the child. Please bid your farewells and leave their belongings with us.
Very well, {TITLE}. {ORPHAN.NAME} will stay in your clan.
Prisoner, I need to have a word with you.
It's not like I have much of a choice, {TITLE}.
I refuse to have a conversation with you. Begone.
I would consider letting you go in exchange for your...services in my bedroom.
It's time to end this. Your existence is bothering me.
You've got yourself a deal! I think I might even enjoy it...
Never! You will not taint my honor with such offers!
Do what you must, you honorless swine!
Oh, heavens! No, please... I beg you!
Wait, {TITLE}! Why choose death...if you could have pleasure?
Hmm... Alright. I accept. I'll spare you only if you perform well.
Unfortunately for you, your death will be my sweetest pleasure.
{HERO1.LINK} released their captive {HERO2.LINK} in exchange for their special services...
Visit Orphanage
Visit the orphanage to adopt a child or get rid of one from your clan
Love Gain Multiplier
Love gained due to flirting or dates is muliplied by this value
Trust Gain Multiplier
Trust gained due to talking or dates is muliplied by this value
{TITLE}, let me give you this exceptional {GIFT} as a token of my affection.
Thank you, {TITLE}! I will keep it close to my bed as a reminder of your...affection. I'll enjoy it every day!
You gave {HERO.LINK} a {TOY}.
Toy Break Chance
Chance a toy can break while being used by a hero.
{HERO.LINK}s toy broke!
Global Default Pregnancies.
Allow default pregnancies for all npcs
Global Default Marriages.
Allow default marriages for all npcs
{HERO.LINK} is disappointed by your neglection of their urgent matter... (Love {NUM}, Trust {NUM2})
{HERO.LINK} asks you to find them, as they have an urgent matter to discuss. Will you make it in time?
{QUESTHERO} requests your presence.
{HERO.LINK} is very happy you fullfilled their request... (Love {NUM}, Trust {NUM2})
Oh, {TITLE}, you are finally here! I was desperately waiting for you!
Look who finally showed up. You weren't in a hurry, weren't you {TITLE}?
Here I am. What is this urgent matter that you asked me to take care of?
Drop your clothes {TITLE}, and follow me. I need to make use of your resourcefulness in a very delicate matter!
Well {TITLE}, someone else took care of my... matter. In a very pleasant way, might I add. You're not needed anymore, farewell for now.
Quest Chance
Chance that a lover of the player starts a quest
Show Relation Changes
Enable this if you want to see relation change notifications (required for the Small Talk mod)
Show Captivity Logs
Enable this if you want to see logs when heroes are captured
{TITLE} I always wondered what looks you prefer. (Information)
Apologies, {TITLE}, but I don't trust you enough to tell you about my personal preferences.
Certainly, {TITLE}. If you really want know, I can tell you...
I feel drawn to the other sex much more. As the saying goes, opposites attract.
I feel drawn to those with the same sex as I have. As the saying goes, birds of the same feather flock together.
I find people of the other sex attractive...but I also feel drawn to those of my own.
I don't have any affections for either sex. They don't interest me much.
I think slim people are more graceful than others.
I don't like people who are too thin or too fat. I like people whose size is just right.
I like people with more weight. There's more to grab for me.
Muscles are overrated. I like it skinny and want to see bones.
People who have just enough muscles are right for me. I don't need anything bigger.
I love muscular people. The bulkier the better.
I like people who are {AGEDIFF} than me. I look for people around the age of {AGE}.
As for you {TITLE}, I think you are a {RATING} out of 100.
not older and not younger
You learned the physical preferences of {HERO.LINK}.
Minimum Trust
Trust points required to consider a hero a friend (Dramalord friend only)
I know you have good stories, tell me some of them! (Friendly chat)
You look amazing, but I'm sure you already know that... (Flirting)
I must confess I have feelings for you, {TITLE}! (Love affair)
There's nothing I'd like more than to be with you and only you... (Dating)
Do you urge for pleasure as well, {TITLE}? (Friend with benefits)
I want you. I know you feel the same way. Meet me in my chambers. (Intimacy)
I need to feel you, {TITLE}! Would you oblige me? (Intimacy)
I love you very much, {TITLE}. Let's move our relationship forward. Will you marry me? (Betrothed)
We are in a settlement, {TITLE}. Let's look for a priest and let's finally get married! (Marriage)
It's just not working between you and I. Let's end this farce before it festers. (Break up)
Thank you for the conversation, {TITLE}.
Tell me {TITLE}, as you travel a lot and meet people, what's your opinion about {POI.NAME}?
I have met {POI.NAME} and I consider them as my friend
Ugh, don't remind me. {POI.NAME} is annoying and I hope I won't meet them again.
{POI.NAME}, right? I actually don't have any particular opinion about them.
Unfortunately, I never had the chance to meet {POI.NAME}, but they sound like a nice person.
It's a good thing I've never met {POI.NAME}. I can image them being a horrible being.
I do not have any opinion about {POI.NAME}, as I've never exchanged a word with them.
That's good to hear! {POI.NAME} is a good friend of mine, as well!
I'm disappointed to hear that. {POI.NAME} is actually a good friend of mine.
You probably don't know {POI.NAME} well. They're actually my friend.
Ugh, really? You like {POI.NAME}? That's very disappointing.
I totally agree! {POI.NAME} is like dirt under my fingernails.
You probably don't know {POI.NAME} well. I actually don't like them.
You are quick to build up an opinion about {POI.NAME}, I have to say.
I don't have an opinion about {POI.NAME}, as well. I don't know them well enough.
That's an excellent point of view! Agreed.
Well, I actually have to disagree with you.
You are quite opinionated, aren't you?
During a previous war, our faction raided an enemy village because they ran out of food. It's sad, but I think it had to be done for the greater good. (Honor)
I disagree. Civilians shouldn't suffer because of politics.
Right. Those peasants should have given their goods volunarily.
I don't know. I guess thats just the way things are.
If you encountered a stronger foe, will you go and fight them nonetheless? (Valor)
Yes, and it doesn't matter whether I win or lose. This world belongs to the brave!
No. Why would I risk my life when I know we can't win?
I can't say. I think that depends on the situation.
I heard that some lords let defeated foes simply leave the battlefield. Isn't that a risk? (Mercy)
They let them go home to their families. I would do the same.
Cut their hands off first, I'd say! It'll make it hard for them to go to battle again.
They are there to kill or be killed, so who should care that much about them?
Recently, the champion of a tournament gave all of his winnings to the poor. (Generosity)
That is a generous move indeed. These kinds of people are rare, unfortunately.
Bah! What a waste of money. Why did they participate in the first place?
Well, I guess it's their money, thus it's their choice.
It's been said that a clan almost left their kingdom after their leader had an argument with their king. (Calculating)
That's stupid. They would have lost their protection because of their pride.
I can understand how they feel. I also lose my temper every now and then.
I cant't judge them for as long as I don't know what the argument was about.
Oh, you're making me blush! I'm happy to hear that.
So does that mean you don't consider me attractive?
I'm pretty sure you have some kind of preference.
I've heard that some lords and ladies have different tastes in physical gender. How about you? (Orientation)
I actually don't have any specific preference.
The owner of the local inn gained some weight. Now the tavern is packed with gawking customers every night. (Weight)
In the highlands, lords and ladies are often bulky and powerful. Many people admire them for being strong. (Build)
There are people who prefer older people, while others prefer younger people. What is your preference? (Age)
I prefer people older then me. Nothing is better than ripe fruit.
I enjoy the energy and...stamina of younger people very much.
I think people around my own age are more attractive.
Do you think trying out new things is sometimes exciting? (Openness)
I like trying new things. It's getting boring without change.
Nonsense. Things are good the way they are and they don't need to change.
Maybe. I don't really care. Things are changing all the time, anyways.
So, are you a person who plans out things, or are you more of the spontaneous type? (Conscientiousness)
Everything needs order and structure. Planning is everything.
No, not really. I usually stumble into my next adventure.
Eh, sometimes I plan, sometimes I don't.
When there's a tournament in town, are you excited to meet new people? (Extroversion)
Oh, absolutely! I can barely stop chatting when I'm around people.
Ugh. No, I'd rather keep to myself. Most people bother me.
Well, that depends. I'd probably meet a few, but not too many.
If one of your friends tell you a sad story, how do you react? (Agreeableness)
I try to comfort them, or help if I can.
Err, my friends know not to bother me with their personal problems.
That depends on what my mood is, I guess.
Managing a party is a lot of stress sometimes. How do you deal with it? (Neuroticism)
Oh yes, it is. To recover, I usually lock myself away for a few days.
It's not stressful at all! I rather enjoy it, actually.
I can manage, though sometimes I take a day off or two.
Minimum Trust FWB
Trust points required to consider a hero being a friend with benefits
I... I am not sure about this. I like you, but do I like you enough?
If we don't try, we never will find out if this could work.
You think too much. Just let it happen.
I am convinced that we can give each other the love that we want and need.
I will be honored if you would consider it.
This is overwhelming. I love you, {PLAYER.NAME}, but are we ready for this step?
Love is an adventure, and this will be our next challenge!
If you think about it, this is the logical next step.
We finally could share everything with each other.
It's the honorable thing to do in our situation.
This is a scandalous proposal indeed... What if feelings get mixed in?
What is a steamy adventure without risks anyway?
Then we re-evaluate the situation and draw the conclusion together.
Think about all the pleasure we could give each other...
Then we release each other and go back to the way things were.
Uhh... well...
You successfully convinced {HERO.LINK}. (Love {LOVE}, Trust {TRUST})
You failed to convince {HERO.LINK}. (Love {LOVE}, Trust {TRUST})
{TITLE}, I would like to add one of your children into my family.
It would be an honor, {TITLE}. Who would you like to take into your family?
I am sorry, {TITLE}. I want my children to have a free choice when they com of age.
Are you sure you want to take my child {CHILD} into your family?
{NAME} is known to eat a lot and doing workouts regularly.
{NAME} is known to barely eat anything and doing workouts regularly.
{NAME} is known to eat a lot and rarely doing workouts.
{NAME} is known to barely eat anything and rarely doing workouts.
{NAME} is known to rarely doing workouts.
{NAME} is known to barely eat anything.
You know, I didn't have a nice childhood as I grew up in an orphanage.
The local gang leader fed us barely and sent us stealing as soon as we were able to walk. If we weren't successful we were beaten.
As soon as I grew teats I was sent to the tavern. I had to entertain disgusting men and make them spend their money on drinks.. or on me.
Once there was an old, orange faced guy who constantly grabbed me by the... you know... without paying. So kicked him in the nuts and fled the city.
Anyway, I figured stabbing is better then getting stabbed... if you get my meaning. So I made it my new business.
As soon as my armpit hair grew I was sent to castle as a servant for elderly ladies. For entertainment while their husbands were busy with war.
One day, while I was... planting seedlings in the silver forest, the heart of... the forest's owner stopped. I had to flee and leave town.
So, the times working with my wood are over, switched to sword and axe instead. Turns out I'm quite good with that too.
Lord Stickyfinger didn't deserve better I suppose.
Ouch! That's a harsh punishment.
Plowing dry soil sounds like a though job.
Well, young timber doesn't belong in ancient forests, right?
I wish to acquire certain goods...
Alright. What are you interested in?
Something long, rounded that can withstand confrontations with moist environments.
Something soft and moist that you can stick your finger into multiple times.
I can sell you a {GOOD} or more if you want.
One will do.
Five should suffice.
I would need at least ten.
No problem! That would be {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} for you. Special price of course.
Nice doing business with you.
No Dialogs For Player
Enable this if you want dialogs but an auto result when talking/flirting/dating.
You are now more attractive to {HERO.LINK}. ({NUMBER})
You are now less attractive to {HERO.LINK}. ({NUMBER})
{HERO.LINK} has more sympathy for you. ({NUMBER})
{HERO.LINK} has less sympathy for you. ({NUMBER})
{HERO1.LINK} and {HERO2.LINK} or not {RELATIONSHIP} anymore
